page.title: 09BAssenthwaite Groups
page.content: {Women's Institute }Mrs Thompson is president this year.She has been in the WI for 52 years.They change presidents every 3 years.The W.I first started November 6, 1899 at 6.30pm in the church room with 30 members.The first president was Mrs Bonnister,the vicar's wife.The subscription was 2 shillings,but now it is Â£3.55.At the meeting they have lectures, filmshows, cookery demonstrations and anything that is of interest. They have supper afterwards,followed by entertainment. The meetings are held every month and last about 2 hours.{Mother's Union } There are 14,000 M.U. branches in the world.It was started in 1876 by Mrs Mary Sumner.The Bassenthwaite branch of 20 members started in February 1985, with Mrs Whitta as the enrolling member.The subscription is Â£3.50 yearly.The money goes to Africa.
